SELECT earner_code ,earner_name ,is_native ,personal_no ,div_name ,div_code FROM earner WHERE worker_id = #{worker_id}
AND earner_code ILIKE concat('%', #{search_value}, '%') OR earner_name ILIKE concat('%', #{search_value}, '%') OR div_code ILIKE concat('%', #{search_value}, '%')

SELECT it.earner_code ,it.worker_id ,it.payment_ym ,e.earner_name ,e.div_code ,e.div_name ,e.is_native ,e.personal_no ,e.is_tuition ,e.is_artist FROM input_task AS it INNER JOIN earner AS e ON it.earner_code = e.earner_code AND it.worker_id = e.worker_id WHERE it.worker_id = #{worker_id} AND it.payment_ym = #{payment_ym}

SELECT count(*) as count ,worker_id ,SUM(total_payment) as total_payment ,SUM(tax_income) as tax_income ,SUM(tax_local) as tax_local ,SUM(tuition_amount) as tuition_amount ,SUM(ins_cost) as ins_cost ,SUM(real_payment) as real_payment FROM earner_tax as main WHERE worker_id = #{worker_id} AND payment_ym = #{payment_ym} GROUP BY worker_id

SELECT earner_code ,SUM(total_payment) as total_payment ,SUM(tax_income) as tax_income ,SUM(tax_local) as tax_local ,SUM(tuition_amount) as tuition_amount ,SUM(ins_cost) as ins_cost ,SUM(real_payment) as real_payment FROM earner_tax WHERE worker_id = #{worker_id} AND payment_ym = #{payment_ym} AND earner_code = #{earner_code} GROUP BY earner_code

SELECT e.is_tuition ,e.deduction_amount ,e.is_artist ,e.ins_reduce ,et.tax_id ,et.tax_rate ,et.ins_rate ,et.total_payment ,et.accrual_ym ,et.payment_ym ,et.payment_date ,case when et.total_payment = 0 then false else true end calculated ,et.total_payment ,tax_income_fc(et.total_payment, et.tax_rate) as tax_income ,tax_local_fc(et.total_payment, et.tax_rate) as tax_local ,artist_cost_fc(et.total_payment) as artist_cost ,ins_cost_fc(total_payment, artist_cost, CAST(ins_rate as numeric),CAST(ins_reduce as numeric)) as ins_cost ,tax_total_fc(tax_income, tax_local, tuition_amount) as tax_total ,real_payment_fc(total_payment, tax_total, ins_cost) as real_payment FROM earner e LEFT JOIN earner_tax et ON e.worker_id = et.worker_id AND e.earner_code = et.earner_code WHERE e.worker_id = #{worker_id} AND e.earner_code = #{earner_code} AND et.payment_ym = #{payment_ym} ORDER BY tax_id
